TopicTitle: The Great Base in Space Case

Articles.Content:
Your challenge, if you choose to accept it, is to build a surface outpost on the body of your choice.

It's that simple. Just check these guidelines:

1. It's gotta be huge. I'm talking massive. Like, a city in space. There'd be cars, landing sites, the works.

You can have as many launches as you want, taking as long as you want, at any price. Just make it

visible from high space. You need to have pictures. At least 2. One of the completed project and one

of how you got the modules there. It can be a single entity docked, (more points) or several small

individual things.

2. Mods are allowed, under these circumstances:

They can add things like engines, life systems, ect. but can't be things like warp drives or hyperedit

(duh.) They can add planets, change planets, add stars, and whatnot, but The points don't matter.

Anything cheaty is a no, as long as they give you unrealistic abilities and whatnot.

3. It's gotta be off Kerbin. You can't have it next to the base. It can be on the Mun, or anywhere else. But

just keep in mind the farther you go the better you score. Here's a basic rubric for grading yourself.

Base Location:

Mun..............................10

Minmus.........................12

Duna.............................15

Eve...............................15

Ike................................17

Gilly..............................17

Dres..............................20

Tylo..............................35

Laythe...........................25

Vall/Pol..........................20

Eeloo.............................30

Outer planets..................30

Base Size:

<10 modules..................10

10-19............................20

20-29............................35

30-49............................50

50+ Modules.................100

Trucks...................+20

Boats....................+40

Planes...................+20

Return Vehicles*.....+50

Crew:

<10 Kerbals..................10

10-19...........................30

20-39...........................50

40-60...........................70

60+............................120

Add these things up and you'll find your score. Have fun, take your time, and start your colonies!

Badges: Will be released when people start doing things, but there are 3, for however high you scored.

*Things that can take the whole crew back, and this score is n+planet location score=this score total
